author: jaz
msg: Implementation of new Authz dynamic access handler using the service engine; placed in securityext to prevent cross dependencies. Implemented test cases for authz.

author: jaz
msg: implementation of new authorization (authz) functionality -- JIRA OFBIZ-2381

NOTE: Even though there are a lot of commonalities with this and the older security framework, this was implemented to not conflict with the existing implementation; the purpose of this is so they both can run side by side during the migration process. Code not migrated will still function as expected and once this is complete, the old implementation will be removed.

author: ate
msg: JS2-972: commons-logging unsuited for cross-context webapplication invocation usage - migrating to slf4j
Turned out since Velocity 1.5 the log4j logger now needs to be specified as .logger instead of as previously .category ...

author: ate
msg: Reverting an accidentally committed enabled PortalFilter (by default commented out)
